snippet: A monstrous cyclone that may be among the most powerful storms ever recorded in the Bay of Bengal was expected to hit the eastern coast of India by Saturday night.
abstract: Monstrous cyclone that may be among the most powerful storms ever recorded in Bay of Bengal is expected to hit the eastern coast of India; storm had sustained winds of 161 miles per hour and gusts of 196 miles per hour, similar in size and intensity to Category 5 hurricane.
lead_paragraph: A monstrous cyclone that may be among the most powerful storms ever recorded in the Bay of Bengal was expected to hit the eastern coast of India by Saturday night.

headline.main: India Braces for Cyclone Expected on East Coast
headline.print_headline: India Braces for Cyclone With Winds Approaching 200 M.P.H.
